annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, I’m making a cocktail that I call the Imperial Cranberry Cobbler, or the Thanksgiving Cobbler. It’s a recipe based on a drin...
annotations.title: Thanksgiving Cobbler | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5 oz or 44 ml of Cognac
.25 oz or 7 ml of Simple Syrup
10-12 cranberries

Muddled Cranberries
Shake
Double Strain
Top with Champagne
Cranberries and Rosemary for Garnish

title: Thanksgiving Cobbler
